author: slava77
body:
this should resolve #21313 
and also #25570 
this is a kludge, not a full fix.

@JanFSchulte @mtosi @mandrenguyen @abaty 
It looks like RecoPixelVertexing/PixelLowPtUtilities/src/TrackCleaner.cc is affecting only the HeavyIons scenario setup running on phase-1.
Please let me know if there is a task already to either purge the HeavyIons scenario workflows for post-phase-0 or to instead migrate them to a phase-1 aware pixel tracking.
title: fix buffer overflow in TrackCleaner
